definition: to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: China's rise has been on everyone's lips in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，国崛起成为街谈巷议的话题。

sentences.english: The Industrial cluster is a topic popularily concerned in the academic world either in our country or abroad in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 产业集群是近年来国内外学术界关注的一个热点话题。

sentences.english: So that was a more recent one.
sentences.chinese: 上面所说的是近年来遇到的挑战。

sentences.english: Scattered piled foundation is a new exploration of pile foundation design theory.
sentences.chinese: 疏桩基础是近年来开始的对桩基设计理论的新探索。

sentences.english: The recent development in renewable natural resource and a viable replacement for wood have led to a growing activity in bamboo resource utilizations.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，竹类资源的研究和利用在国内外十分活跃。

sentences.english: Other scientists also have worked with low- phytate feed in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，其他科学家也进行了低植酸盐饲料的研究。

sentences.english: Sustainable developing architecture is a hot topic under discussion these years.
sentences.chinese: 可持续发展建筑是近年来建筑界讨论的热点。

sentences.english: This is the brief summary about the recent study progress on the secretion proteins of Mycobacteria .
sentences.chinese: 对近年来分支杆菌分泌蛋白研究进展进行了简要综述。

sentences.english: However, in recent years, uncertain multi-attribute decision making attracts more and more attention.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，不确定多属性决策引起了学术界的广泛关注。

sentences.english: Thermal spring tourism has become a hot topic in the field of tourism research in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，温泉旅游成为旅游研究的热点问题之一。

sentences.english: This paper presents an overview of recent advances in the studies of two-compartment PDF.
sentences.chinese: 文中就近年来双室双袋PDF的研究进展作一综述。

sentences.english: In recent years, many studies have been done in the essential oil.
sentences.chinese: 近年来关于香附的研究主要是挥发油。

sentences.english: In recent years, aquaporins in the brain become a research hotspot.
sentences.chinese: 近年来脑部的水通道蛋白成为研究热点。

sentences.english: Investment and net exports generated close to three-quarters of China's incremental demand in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，投资和净出口占中国需求增量的近四分之三。

sentences.english: In recent years the researches on the outsourcing business of book-acquisition and cataloguing have become a subject of great interest in China.
sentences.chinese: 近年来我国图书馆业务外包研究成为热门话题。

sentences.english: Objective To review the recent studies on health evaluation indicator systems.
sentences.chinese: 目的对近年来国内外卫生指标体系的研究进行综述。

definition: the last few years/last several years/recent years
year after year/with each passing year/over the years
day by day/more and more/increasingly/more and more with each passing day
ever since a long time ago
(increasing) day by day/(more critical) with every passing day/gradually
domestic and international/at home and abroad
(of prices, rates etc) to remain high
near in time/in the near future/very soon/recent
